description:
In the following course, I will share with you how to operate a successful coinbox fundraising campaign for your charity. How would you like to bring in $2000 per day for your charity or non-profit with very little overhead cost?

If your answer is YES, then I can help you obtain those kind of numbers through my Coinbox Fundraising Campaign course.

In this course, I will review everything that you need to get started from booking locations, hiring and training staff, tips and tricks to improve your daily fundraising totals.

This course will save you from making the same mistakes that I made in the beginning. I hope to share with you many tips and tricks that will ensure your success in operating a coinbox fundraising campaign.
title: Coinbox Fundraising for your Charity or Not for Profit
